# Artifact Main Ability: # These Main Ability white stats must be added if their main ability by the same name is present, meaning you only get the choice of 2 other white stats from section B.
# Artifact Stats (white text numbers)- Legit items will have ONE from section A and TWO from section B.
# section A Mutually exclusive with the Main Ability white stats from above, cannot have both a stat linked to Main Ability white stats AND a section A
